channel.description: Recent content in emotion on Kamil Pro

item.title: A winner!
item.description: We are all winners, undoubtedly. Whatever we do, whenever we create an action – we must win. Well, not really. Since the childhood we are taught and pushed to be the best. Get a grade A or B, at least C. Like the D, E or even F don’t exist. We are pushed through countless tests and exams, and being challenged on daily basis. And there is always somebody, who in a good faith has to say that “you won” even though we actually did not.
